import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const SearchBar = (props) => { const [critter, setCritter] = useState("bugs") const [month, setMonth] = useState(new Date().getMonth()) const [hour, setHour] = useState(0) const history = useHistory(); const handleCritter = e => { setCritter(e.target.value) } const handleMonth = e => { setMonth(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); history.push(`/${critter}`); } return (

) } export default SearchBar;
